website_summaries.verdict: Achieve warm summer and fall looks that will survive the heat without fading or creasing.
pros: A variety of matte and metallic shades to choose from
Warm tones are the perfect choice for summer and fall
Formula is creamy with little to no fallout
Create subtle to dramatic looks and everything in between
cons: A number of colors look like duplicates of each other

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful bronze palette.
customer_reviews.text: This palette was $10 cheaper on Amazon than it is at Ulta. The colors are awesome. I have 2 other Naked palettes that I bought at ulta. This one seems legit. Beautiful colors.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan P.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Not broken, not packaged very pretty but definitely well protected, covered in bubble wrap,, which is far more important to me. Gorgeous colors. Stays on ALL night. No lines, no smudgeds no runs. Even though I work in a factory with 4 industrial ovens with temps reaching over 110 degrees. ***I use primer. Its called "thank me later "*****
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn

customer_reviews.title: You can’t go wrong with urban decay. Gorgeous palette as usual. This one is so Miami ish. Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: You can’t go wrong with urban decay. Gorgeous palette as usual. This one is so Miami ish. Love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Great colors.
customer_reviews.text: Love the colors. It would work on every skin tone. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Brigitte

customer_reviews.title: Love the colors but....
customer_reviews.text: The color pallet is great but there is a great deal of fall out which isn't so great.
customer_reviews.author: Buffysk8s

customer_reviews.title: Good product, wish it had different packaging
customer_reviews.text: Love the product just wish it had that plastic on the inside to keep the eyeshadow from getting everywhere. Otherwise very nice.
customer_reviews.author: foster scott

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I previously bought the petite pallete which I love, and I love the full palette at well!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for redheads
customer_reviews.text: As a redhead. I’m always looking for the perfect combo of soft peaches and warm colors to bring out the green in my eyes. Very happy with the smoothness and stay as well. Easy to apply.
customer_reviews.author: Sasha Welkom

customer_reviews.title: Eye Shadow Palette
customer_reviews.text: This item was a Christmas gift for my aunt who loved the eyeshadow palette. Would definitely order this for me.
customer_reviews.author: Leticia G Quiroga

customer_reviews.title: Great Color
customer_reviews.text: I love the high level of pigments in this pallet. The orange to red to brown/purple spectrum is most intriguing and complementary. The brush that came with is crap but I find that with most pallets.
customer_reviews.author: TrickyFae

product_meta.title: Urban Decay Naked Heat Eyeshadow Palette, 12 Fiery Amber Neutral Shades - Ultra-Blendable, Rich Colors with Velvety Texture - Set Includes Mirror & Double-Ended Makeup Brush
product_meta.description: New in Box Authentic Naked Heat Eyeshadow Palette
feature_bullets: YOU LOOK BETTER NAKED - Urban Decay Naked Heat Eyeshadow Palette features 12 spicy amber neutrals featuring silky mattes, smooth shimmers, and sparkling metallics for smoldering eye looks that flatter every eye color, eye shape, and skin tone.
HIGH-PIGMENT SHADES - Naked Heat palette shades include cruelty-free Ounce, Chaser, Sauced, Low Blow, Lumbre, He Devil, Dirty Talk, Scorched, Cayenne, En Fuego, Ashes, and Ember.
BURN, BABY, BURN - This smokin' eyeshadow palette includes warm browns, burnt oranges, and rich siennas. Its mix of coppery mattes, metallics, and shimmers makes for versatile, endless combinations.

PIGMENT INFUSION SYSTEM - Every shade in our paraben-free, sulfate-free, and phthalate-free eye shadow palettes features our proprietary ingredient blend that supplies velvety texture, rich color, and extreme blendability.
PLAYS WELL WITH OTHERS - Try pairing your Naked Heat Palette with these other Urban Decay products: Original Eyeshadow Primer Potion, Perversion Mascara, and All Nighter Makeup Setting Spray.
